song.title: Come To The Water
song.lyrics:
[1] .G C G C Come, Come to the water, all who are thirsty, come and be filled || .G C G C Come, come to the river, brothers and sisters, come and be healed . G Come and be healed
[C] .Em C G D We Believe in the Kingdom Come, We Believe in the risen son || . Em C G D You Bring our hearts to life || .Em C G D Lord we come with our hands up high, We believe you will satisfy || . Em C G D Em C G D You bring our hearts to life, You bring our hearts to life . G C G C We are alive
[2] .G C G G See, The people returning, the love of the father, drawing us in || .G C G C See, Salvation Coming, Jesus our Savior, Light of the world . G G Light of the World
[B1] .G C G Let Revival Come, Let the people sing . C The glory of Your name
[B2] .Em C G Let revival come, Let the people sing . C The glory of your name
song.presentation: 1 1 C 2 C B1 B1 B2 B2 C
